author: Anonymous Mouse
title: What am I doing wrong in this signature?
question: What am I doing wrong trying to make a signature for this simple problem? I've tried so many things but its not accepting any of them as an answer.
student_answer: There is a specific name for a type of data for words, try looking in the language tab in edx.
instructor_answer: How do you form words on Racket, and what is that data type referred to?
